item.title: Commands
item.description: These are the available commands for Dishwasher. Not all are shown. For your reference: [argument] represents a required argument. {argument} is an optional requirement. argument (default) is the default if not specified. Basic Features about Tells you about the bot. avy [user/“server” (yourself)] Returns an avatar of a user. color [hex color code] Shows an image of the color you specify. hello Says hello to you. help Gives you a link to this page.

item.title: Dishwasher
item.description: Dishwasher is a moderation bot created for the OneShot Discord Server. Commands Invite Source
